document_data.mainbody:
Karr Nevrim was a half-orc rebel and a cell leader of the Nashers in Neverwinter in the late 15 century DR.
Karr had a taste for fine liquors and owned a bottle of Ferguson-Mosiondz Single Malt.
Following the defeat of Nashers second-in-command Karzov in the , Karrs cell continued to hold out from their base in the sewers below the old Merchant Square in the Tower District. He had underhanded dealings with the Many-Arrows orcs who had occupied the district that threatened the rest of the city. When Captain Janros learned of this (via reports carried by a slain courier), he dispatched an adventurer to invade their sewer base and slay Karr.
